work-item.field:
By default test cases are not visible in Live Plan but by adding test cases to plans we will be able to see test cases.
This might be usefull to reserve ressources like machines, software, etc whic are needed for test executions.
  • Open Administration > Work Items > Live Plan
  • As we can see by default everything which has been added to a plan will also be visible in Live Plan
  • Go to frontend and create a new "Test" Plan (Child of Team 1) "Test Iteration 1"
    • Set a start and du date
    • Add test case to "Test Iteration 1"
  • Verify test case is now visible in live plan
  • (optional) Currently there isn´t any "Planned In" attribute visible in test cases. To add this attribute Go into Administartion > Work Items > Form Configuration > Form Layout of Test Case
  •  Add <field id="plannedIn"/> to your form configuration
  • Verify Planned In field is visible in frontend
Hint: In older Polarion versions Live Plan query was set to "time points"
Make Test Cases visible for Live Plan
